H0.text: What general term is used to describe any experiment not carried out in a living body. Laboratory Experiment

H1.text: What general term is used to describe any experiment not carried out in a living body. Ex Vivo

H2.text: What general term is used to describe any experiment not carried out in a living body. Controlled Environment Study

H3.text: What general term is used to describe any experiment not carried out in a living body. InVitro

A4.text: In vitro studies are conducted using components of an organism that have been isolated from their usual biological surroundings.

A5.text: Anything that is not in vivo is in vitro.
